text: Enrolled my 3 yr old for drumming lesson here. Very good experience!! Teachers are nice and experienced. After a few sessions,  my kid can really drum well. Highly recommended !!!!!!!

Teachers here are all welcoming and really know how to make learning a fun process! Definitely recommending this place to those that want to get music lessons! Drum lessons with teacher Mikhael gives great results!

M Music Studio Sg
I have started my instrument journey at M Music Studio Sg for almost 1 year.

Me, as a person who has no music background at all, after a few months learning, and now I'm able to play a simple song on a recital. Is it quite a surprised for me. ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„

The teachers are all passionate in teaching and willing to share all the details or technique to you, just to want you to keep improving a little by little in every single class.

Of course, you might think that learning music is boring unless you really like it. But I would say, learning music could be fun and enjoyable. Because the teachers at here are all have the  experience to make it fun and use a simple way to make it easier to understand. This really help me to get understand faster and easier.

Furthermore, they are also ok a good observer and good listener to me. Example like when some of the part which is I can't do it well after few try, they will tell me why I can't do well, after that they will show me the correct way and then practice with me together step by step until you can do it correctly.

I really appreciate that's the way their teaching and passionate on me and I will keep learning just wanted to make it better and better on my music instruments.

Thank you M Music Studio SgðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š
Responsible and Friendly teachers. I strongly recommend to parent to send their children for lesson at M Music centre.

I have drum lessons with Teacher Mikhael that are very fun, and not too structured as other places as there is room for self ideation for different drum patterns and does not force me to play in a specific way.
